name: TAMIL NADU AGRICULTURAL UNIVERSITY
desc: Tamil Nadu Agricultural University, located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, is a leading institution for agricultural education and research. With state-of-the-art facilities and renowned faculty, it offers comprehensive programs to prepare students for careers in agriculture and related fields.

name: ACHARYA NG RANGA AGRICULTURAL UNIVERSITY
desc: Acharya NG Ranga Agricultural University, situated in Guntur, Andhra Pradesh, is a premier institution for agricultural education and research. With a focus on innovation and sustainable practices, it prepares students to address the challenges in agriculture and contribute to rural development.

name: PUNJAB AGRICULTURAL UNIVERSITY
desc: Punjab Agricultural University, located in Ludhiana, Punjab, is a renowned institution known for its excellence in agricultural education and research. With a rich legacy and modern infrastructure, it offers comprehensive programs to empower students with the knowledge and skills for agricultural innovation and development.

name: ANBIL DHARMALINGAM AGRICULTURAL COLLEGE AND RESEARCH INSTITUTE
desc: Anbil Dharmalingam Agricultural College and Research Institute, situated in Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu, is a distinguished institution for agricultural education and research. With a focus on experiential learning and industry collaborations, it prepares students to address the challenges in agriculture and contribute to rural development.

name: GOVIND BALLABH PANT UNIVERSITY OF AGRICULTURE AND TECHNOLOGY
desc: Govind Ballabh Pant University of Agriculture and Technology, located in Pantnagar, Uttarakhand, is a leading institution for agricultural education and research. With a commitment to excellence and sustainable practices, it equips students with the knowledge and skills to address the evolving challenges in agriculture.

name: MAHATMA PHULE KRISHI VIDYAPEETH
desc: Mahatma Phule Krishi Vidyapeeth, situated in Pune, Maharashtra, is a renowned institution for agricultural education and research. With a focus on innovation and entrepreneurship, it prepares students to contribute to the agricultural sector's growth and development.

name: BIRSA AGRICULTURAL UNIVERSITY
desc: Birsa Agricultural University, located in Ranchi, Jharkhand, is a premier institution for agricultural education and research. With a focus on sustainable agriculture and rural development, it prepares students to address the challenges faced by farmers and contribute to agricultural innovation.

name: DR. RAJENDRA PRASAD CENTRAL AGRICULTURAL UNIVERSITY
desc: Dr. Rajendra Prasad Central Agricultural University, situated in Samastipur, Bihar, is a distinguished institution for agricultural education and research. With a focus on inclusive growth and agricultural innovation, it equips students with the knowledge and skills to address the challenges in agriculture and rural development.

name: JUNAGADH AGRICULTURAL UNIVERSITY
desc: Junagadh Agricultural University, located in Junagadh, Gujarat, is a leading institution for agricultural education and research. With a focus on sustainable agriculture and technology-driven solutions, it prepares students to address the challenges faced by farmers and contribute to agricultural development.

name: DR DY PATIL COLLEGE OF AGRICULTURE BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
desc: Dr. DY Patil College of Agriculture Business Management, situated in Pune, Maharashtra, is a renowned institution offering programs in agricultural management and entrepreneurship. With a focus on industry-relevant curriculum and practical training, it prepares students for leadership roles in agribusiness and rural development.

name: SAM HIGGINBOTTOM UNIVERSITY OF AGRICULTURE TECHNOLOGY AND SCIENCES
